title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by Ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) built with SvelteKit.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, POJO mapping.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama with chat history, prompt templates, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement for VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama; use local models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model; slash commands & thread support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama installations on macOS/Linux.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple DSL for chat and generate endpoints.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers and execute prompts in CI pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm ideas, and answer questions using Ollama.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin that adds Ollama commands for text generation inside notes.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama; generate, chat, pull models with idiomatic Go APIs.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack with Ollama, Open WebUI, and GPU runtime.
